verses.name: Psalms 10:15
verses.text: Break thou the arm of the wicked and the evil man: seek out his wickedness till thou find none.

verses.name: Psalms 10:16
verses.text: The Lord is King for ever and ever: the heathen are perished out of his land.

verses.name: Psalms 10:17
verses.text: Lord, thou hast heard the desire of the humble: thou wilt prepare their heart, thou wilt cause thine ear to hear:

verses.name: Psalms 10:18
verses.text: To judge the fatherless and the oppressed, that the man of the earth may no more oppress.
